Packages that use ProgressionCostFactory
Package
Description
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre
Fundamental elements for defining planning problems and plans.
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.prog
A planner that performs forward (progression) search through the space of states.

    ReachabilityHeuristic.FACTORY
    A factory for creating reachability heuristics.
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    RelaxedPlanHeuristic.FACTORY
    A factory for creating relaxed plan heuristic costs.
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    GraphHeuristic.MAX
    A factory for producing max graph heuristics, which define the cost of a proposition to be the same as its highest cost part.
    final ProgressionCostFactory
    RepeatedNodeHeuristic.Factory.parent
    The cost function factory that will be used to create the cost function to be used any time a node is not being repeated
    final ProgressionCostFactory
    RepeatedRootHeuristic.Factory.parent
    The cost function factory that will be used to create the cost function to be used any time a root is not being repeated
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    ProgressionCostFactory.PLAN_SIZE
    A progression cost factory that always returns the plan size cost.
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    GraphHeuristic.SUM
    A factory for producing sum graph heuristics, which define the cost of a proposition to be the sum of the cost of its parts.
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    ProgressionCostFactory.TEMPORAL
    A progression cost factory that always returns the temporal cost.
    static final ProgressionCostFactory
    ProgressionCostFactory.ZERO
    A progression cost factory that always returns the zero cost.
